list_definition.definition: a person whose job is to carry luggage in a train station etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The old lady could not find a porter to carry her suitcase from the train.

list_definition.definition: a person whose job is to carry things eg in rough country where there is no other form of transport

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He set off into the jungle with three porters.

list_definition.definition: a doorman or attendant in a hotel etc
